meanings.definition: Relating to the physics of the earth's structure and processes.
meanings.sent1: The geophysical study of earthquakes helps us understand how the earth's layers move.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use geophysical tools to measure the magnetic fields of the earth.
meanings.sent3: The geophysical puzzle of the shifting continents kept the researchers intrigued.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a geophysical map, with thoughts shifting like tectonic plates.
meanings.sent5: The geophysical forces at play beneath the surface can cause dramatic changes.

meanings.definition: A branch of science that deals with the physical processes and properties of the earth.
meanings.sent1: Geophysical explores the earth's physical properties to understand its processes.
meanings.sent2: The geophysical department at the university focuses on earth's natural phenomena.
meanings.sent3: The geophysical experts gathered to discuss the latest findings on earth's dynamics.
meanings.sent4: In the geophysical realm, nature's forces shape the world we live in.
meanings.sent5: Studying geophysical phenomena can reveal the secrets of our planet's past.
